title: Experience
description: Here is a summary of my professional experience and the skills I have developed.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Working on building scalable web applications using modern technologies.
responsibilities: Designed and developed scalable web applications using modern frontend and backend technologies, ensuring optimal performance and maintainability.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams including designers and backend engineers to implement new features and enhance existing functionality.
Optimized application performance by refactoring components, improving API integrations, and ensuring responsive behavior across multiple devices and screen sizes.

experiences.title: React Intern
experiences.description: Working on building scalable web applications using modern technologies.
responsibilities: Assisted in developing and maintaining dynamic React-based user interfaces with a focus on clean component architecture and reusability.
Implemented new features and resolved UI bugs by collaborating with senior developers and participating in regular code reviews.
Improved user experience by optimizing rendering performance and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
